channel.title: Probems after transferign to Vps
channel.description: Alright last night tranfered my whole server to a vps. I have ran into a few issues. Its running on cent. 1. Since capitalization matters on lunix its causing problems when old players try to login. It creates another playerfile if not used exactly. 2. Saving player files is to slow, there are sometime 2-5 min resets cause it does nto save the player file quick enoth. Any ideas?

item.title: Probems after transferign to Vps
item.dc:creator: @big_guy608 big guy608
item.description:
@big_guy608 wrote:

Alright last night tranfered my whole server to a vps.
I have ran into a few issues. Its running on cent.

  1. Since capitalization matters on lunix its causing problems when old players try to login. It creates another playerfile if not used exactly.
  2. Saving player files is to slow, there are sometime 2-5 min resets cause it does nto save the player file quick enoth.
    Any ideas?

Read full topic
